If you are running from a bin distribution on *nix, I believe you need
to s=
et JAVA_HOME in your ENV vars "export
JAVA_HOME=3D/path/to/your/java".  Thi=
s probably pertains to Win32 also.

But from my experience (I'm just anothe=
r new user), once you start
heritrix, it binds to port 8080 (or whatever yo=
u told it to bind to)
and then the webroot on that port is the heritrix log=
 in screen.  

That error makes me think that the problem is Heritrix can't=
 find a
JRE lib because your CLASSPATH isn't set correctly.  So you probabl=
y
diagnosed the problem yourself :)
